im semi interested, but i really want to see if its possible to make gladiator interent-multiplayer based.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Daniel Paul Hightower <dph_of_rules@...> 
  To: gladiator@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, December 15, 2002 11:32 AM
  Subject: [gladiator] Moving the list


  After repeated efforts to contact the listowner so that I can get some 
  priviledgess to make the list better, I am going to move the group.  
  Don't worry; the new group will have this name and the old group will 
  have a different name.

  What I am looking for is 2-3 moderators to start off with for the new 
  group.  Please email me with a response within 2-3 days if you are 
  interested.


  The Gladiator Mailing List


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Terms of Service.
